1. Scientists reportedly hiding AI text prompts in academic papers to receive positive peer reviews  The Guardian
  2. Researchers are using AI for peer reviews — and finding ways to cheat it  The Washington Post

  4. “They’re Hacking the AI to Approve Their Lies”: Scientists Busted Embedding Hidden Prompts to Trick Systems Into Validating Fake Studies  Sustainability Times
